attributes.action: Prevent the EU and others from over-regulating financial services.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst banking/other finance operations need to be overhauled to prevent excessive risk-taking, it is paramount that the British Government prevents over-regulation that can threaten Britain's position as a leading financial centre. In particular, if the taxpayer is to achieve value for money on its UK banking investments, this will be critical.
